reviews.review_msg: Charles is a good seminar leader: he encourages student contributions, but if people are bewildered he picks up the slack and lectures. His interpretations can be challenging to keep up with but usually help make the text more accessible, as Milton himself is quite challenging. Tough and dense course, but rewarding. Expect to thrive or be crushed.
Great teacher, just be prepared to back up your statements or presentations in class 'cause he'll cut through the BS.
